title: The US OPEN: Forthcoming Fireworks
body_text: The holiday weekend has arrived and there isn't a more exciting place to be than the red, white, and blue WHS battleground. Rejoin your family and friends for this special reunion featuring a slew of ECD's biggest names, starting with our headliners Tom and Kevin Adams. Arrival time is set for 6pm.
